uploaded_attachment:
You've uploaded an attachment, you can only upload %ATTACHMENTS_LEFT% more attachment(s).
If you're ready, you may continue answering the question!
max_attachments_reached: You've reached the max attachments you can use!
goodbye_message:
Thanks for submitting!
Just send another message to me to post a different bug when your %COOLDOWN% seconds of cooldown are over.
submitted_by_message:
**Submitted by user:** %USER%

**Send me a private message and say hi to report a bug!**
cooldown_message: You're still on a cooldown for %COOLDOWN% seconds!
welcome_message:
Hello, in order to post your bug I will need some more information from you!
I'll ask some questions and you may answer them if you like to.

Just remember that you'll only have %TIMEOUT% seconds for every question, otherwise I'll close this DM!
Also you can upload an attachment at any question!

questions.question: **Are you using a PC or Console?**
questions.wrong_possible_answer: **You can only enter the following answers!**

questions.question: **Explain the bug in as much detail as possible!**
